messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] [NHEN-SpeakOut] Homeschooling in the News  3/29/01
messages.msgSnippet: ... I just wanted to mention that the current issue of Working Mother has an article about education alternatives, including homescholing.  It gives a succinct
messages.messageBody:
>Laura Derrick
>National Home Education Network
>http://www.nhen.org

I just wanted to mention that the current issue of Working Mother has an
article about education alternatives, including homescholing. It gives a
succinct summary of reasons to homeschool, the usual counterweight, "how
will you know if you are keeping up?" and a sweet quote from Laura about
why she homeschools (unschools) her kids.

I was reading this at the dentist (shudder!) and it brightened my day.

Betsy
